mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DogWalker (user_id, weekday_am, weekday_pm, weekend_am, weekend_pm, all, time, handle, introduce) VALUES (#{userId}, #{weekdayAm}, #{weekdayPm}, #{weekendAm}, #{weekendPm}, #{all}, #{time}, #{handle}, #{introduce})
mapper.update: UPDATE DogWalker SET weekday_am = #{weekdayAm}, weekday_pm = #{weekdayPm}, weekend_am = #{weekendAm}, weekend_pm = #{weekendPm}, all = #{all}, time = #{time}, handle = #{handle}, introduce = #{introduce} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
